references.paper_title: Towards open set 3d learning: A benchmark on object point clouds
references.reason: This paper provides a benchmark dataset for open-set 3D learning, which is crucial for evaluating the proposed method's performance in this challenging setting.
This paper introduces hypergraph convolution and attention mechanisms, which are fundamental components of the proposed HAFR framework for capturing high-order correlations in the data.
This paper explores open-set learning techniques, which are essential for addressing the challenge of unseen categories during open-set 3D object retrieval.

references.paper_title: Adversarial reciprocal points learning for open set recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces adversarial learning methods for open-set recognition, which are relevant to the proposed method's ability to generalize to unseen categories.

references.paper_title: Deep learning for instance retrieval: A survey
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning techniques for instance retrieval, which are relevant to the proposed method's use of deep learning models for feature extraction and representation.
